text: Erick Luis Conrado Carvalho (born 14 November 1997), simply known as Erick, is a Brazilian footballer who currently plays as a midfielder for Athletico Paranaense. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|State League !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|Continental !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |Arapongas |2016 |Paranaense Série Bronze |colspan="2"|—||16||3||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||16||3 |- |rowspan="3"|PSTC |2017 |Série D |6||0||9||1||2||0||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||17||1 |- |2018 |Paranaense |colspan="2"|—||0||0||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||0||0 |- !colspan="2" |Total !6!!0!!9!!1!!2!!0!!colspan="2"|—!!colspan="2"|—!!17!!1 |- |Operário Ferroviário (loan) |2018 |Série C |20||4||3||3||0||0||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||23||7 |- |rowspan="3"|Athletico Paranaense |2019 |rowspan="2"|Série A |14||1||14||2||1||0||1Appearance(s) in Copa Libertadores||0||0||0||30||3 |- |2020 |0||0||5||0||0||0||2||0||1Appearance(s) in Supercopa do Brasil||0||8||0 |- !colspan="2"|Total !14!!1!!19!!2!!1!!0!!3!!0!!1!!0!!38!!3 |- ! colspan="3" |Career total !40!!5!!47!!9!!3!!0!!3!!0!!1!!0!!91!!14 |} ;Notes ==Honours== Athletico Paranaense *Campeonato Paranaense: 2019 *J.League Cup / Copa Sudamericana Championship: 2019 *Copa do Brasil: 2019 ==References== ==External links== * Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Campeonato Brasileiro Série A players Category:Campeonato Brasileiro Série C players Category:Campeonato Brasileiro Série D players Category:Paraná Soccer Technical Center players Category:Operário Ferroviário Esporte Clube players Category:Club Athletico Paranaense players
